name: Pizza Disco Service
description:
Oh, you are late! You have to deliver the pizzas as fast as possible!

But watch out: While this quarantine time everyone wants pizza. So everyone runs on the street and tries to steal one of your yummy pizzas. You have a little provisions the hungry can steal, but if they eat to much, you have to restart your deliverance.

To get the people away, you can shoot scruffy pizzas at them. This will kill their appetite for pizza and let them go home again. But shooting isn’t that easy: Your shooting mechanism is linked with your car radio. So it will shoot when a note of the right pitch is played...

Besides the hungry people, there are sometimes obstacles on the way, too. If you crash with them, one Pizza will fly out of your car.

The hungry people spawning mechanism is like the shooting mechanism sound-based. That’s the same with the obstacle spawning mechanism. So don’t be surprised if you can’t shoot for a fey seconds.

Because all the sound-files must be analysed by the code when you start the game, it can take a few seconds to load. Please be patient and wait.

Movement: W A S D or arrow keys. Your radio is controlling the shooting, so you don’t need to press any key. You only have to move your mouse cursor to the place you want to shoot.

Music: “No Limit” with Garageband

Art made with Inkscape

Godot 3.2.1 (stable) used

WARNING: flashing screen
